motorcycles.title: Yamaha R1M
motorcycles.description: Featuring next‑generation R‑Series styling, sophisticated electronic control, supersport braking and suspension performance and a high‑performance crossplane engine.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha R1
motorcycles.description: Combining top‑tier superbike performance with stunning World GP 60th Anniversary Edition styling details—an R1 that commands attention from the first glance.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha R7
motorcycles.description: A new generation supersport with Yamaha's legendary styling combines an advanced CP2 engine with an ultra‑thin and lightweight chassis to provide torquey performance on both the track and the street.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha YZF
motorcycles.description: Get the look & feel of a Yamaha factory ride with your own Monster Energy‑inspired, all‑new YZ450F.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha YZ
motorcycles.description: Designed for the discriminating mini‑moto racer with dreams of victory. The YZ65 is the perfect first step into the victory zone.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha YZ
motorcycles.description: Pure performance and full‑throttle adrenaline is what you get from this lightweight and reliable two‑stroke moto machine, with the look of a full factory Monster Energy® ride.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha MT
motorcycles.description: Featuring a distinctive next generation look and features, as well as an advanced twin‑cylinder engine. Experience the best balance of performance and value the Dark Side has to offer.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha MT
motorcycles.description: Featuring exclusive, special edition coloring, premium KYB® and Öhlins® suspension and a cruise control system, experience the class‑dominating middleweight masterpiece born from the Darkness.

motorcycles.title: Yamaha MT
motorcycles.description: The highest specification Master of Torque is here. Once you experience the MT‑10 SP's total performance, you'll know you've truly entered the Dark Side.
